content: A passionate software engineer with a focus on backend development, cloud architecture, and DevOps.
I have extensive experience as a full-stack developer, working with modern technologies across web, cloud, and infrastructure.
I enjoy solving complex problems, building scalable systems, and continuously learning new skills.
My interests include cloud computing, distributed systems, automation, and mentoring others in technology.
I'm always open to new challenges and opportunities to collaborate.
Connect with me on LinkedIn.
Check out my work on GitHub.

Navigate using the arrow keys or Vim motions.
